data.actual_result: static image and link ends in .png a
data.expected_result: you see a animated gif and the link ends in a .gif
data.short_description: unable to set a gif as profile picture using the discord picture editor (nitro users only)
data.steps_to_repro: - make sure you have nitro - take any gif to upload as pfp - press the button to save it in the editor - observe  the result from desktop or the avatar link from a bot that can display your avatar
